      <div class="ember-view" id="ember25028605">
       <a aria-label="Visit WQXR (Opens in new window)" class="gtm__click-tracking" data-action="Brand Header" data-label="wqxr-logo" href="https://www.wqxr.org?utm_medium=partnersite&amp;utm_campaign=brandheader&amp;utm_source=wnycstudios" target="_blank">

        <div class="ember-view" id="ember25028633">
         <a aria-label="Visit WQXR (Opens in new window)" class="gtm__click-tracking" data-action="Brand Header" data-label="wqxr-logo" href="https://www.wqxr.org?utm_medium=partnersite&amp;utm_campaign=brandheader&amp;utm_source=wnycstudios" target="_blank">

        <path d="M55 29.706c0 .714-.43 1.294-.958 1.294h-.084c-.529 0-.958-.58-.958-1.294v-6.412c0-.714.43-1.294.958-1.294h.084c.529 0 .958.58.958 1.294v6.412zM73.942 1.492A1.731 1.731 0 0 0 72.724 1c-.46 0-.894.175-1.22.492A1.65 1.65 0 0 0 71 2.682c0 .45.178.87.504 1.188 9.4 9.17 9.4 24.09 0 33.26A1.65 1.65 0 0 0 71 38.32c0 .45.178.87.504 1.19.326.315.76.491 1.22.491.46 0 .892-.176 1.217-.492C79.138 34.44 82 27.688 82 20.5c0-7.189-2.86-13.939-8.058-19.008zM60.57 7.455a1.475 1.475 0 0 0-2.128 0A1.568 1.568 0 0 0 58 8.553c0 .413.157.804.442 1.096 6.066 6.26 6.066 16.442 0 22.7A1.57 1.57 0 0 0 58 33.447c0 .416.157.805.442 1.097a1.466 1.466 0 0 0 2.127 0C64.07 30.933 66 26.12 66 20.998c0-5.12-1.93-9.931-5.43-13.543z">
        </path>
        <path d="M68.086 4.506A1.842 1.842 0 0 0 66.808 4c-.483 0-.938.18-1.278.506a1.675 1.675 0 0 0 0 2.445c3.777 3.614 5.857 8.425 5.857 13.55 0 5.123-2.08 9.934-5.857 13.547a1.675 1.675 0 0 0 0 2.445c.34.328.795.507 1.278.507s.936-.18 1.278-.507C72.544 32.23 75 26.548 75 20.501c0-6.05-2.456-11.73-6.914-15.995zM22.56 32.35c-6.068-6.259-6.068-16.441 0-22.7a1.59 1.59 0 0 0 0-2.196 1.472 1.472 0 0 0-2.128 0C16.93 11.066 15 15.878 15 21c0 5.122 1.93 9.933 5.432 13.545a1.472 1.472 0 0 0 2.128 0 1.587 1.587 0 0 0 0-2.195zM10.494 3.87c.327-.318.506-.738.506-1.188 0-.45-.18-.873-.506-1.189A1.727 1.727 0 0 0 9.276 1c-.461 0-.894.175-1.22.492C2.862 6.56 0 13.312 0 20.5 0 27.69 2.861 34.44 8.057 39.508A1.74 1.74 0 0 0 9.275 40c.461 0 .893-.176 1.218-.492a1.65 1.65 0 0 0 0-2.378 23.143 23.143 0 0 1 .001-33.26z">
        </path>
        <path d="M11.613 20.501c0-5.125 2.081-9.936 5.859-13.55a1.678 1.678 0 0 0 0-2.445A1.841 1.841 0 0 0 16.193 4c-.482 0-.937.18-1.277.506C10.456 8.772 8 14.451 8 20.501c0 6.047 2.456 11.73 6.916 15.992.341.328.795.507 1.277.507.483 0 .937-.18 1.279-.507a1.678 1.678 0 0 0 0-2.445c-3.779-3.613-5.859-8.424-5.859-13.547zM29 30.743C29 32.541 30.436 34 32.206 34h.588C34.564 34 36 32.541 36 30.743v-9.486C36 19.459 34.564 18 32.794 18h-.588C30.436 18 29 19.459 29 21.257v9.486zM27 29.706c0 .714.43 1.294.958 1.294h.084c.529 0 .958-.58.958-1.294v-6.412c0-.714-.43-1.294-.958-1.294h-.084c-.529 0-.958.58-.958 1.294v6.412z">
        </path>
       </g>
      </svg>
      <span class="text--hero-inverted knockout">
       Welcome to
      </span>
      <span class="text--hero-inverted knockout">
       WNYC Studios
      </span>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="featured-promo--home-top featured-promo featured-promo--show ember-view" id="ember25028671">
     <h2 class="featured-promo__title">
      Featured Show
     </h2>
     <div class="featured-promo__container">
      <img alt="" class="featured-promo__image" src="https://media.wnyc.org/i/1080/720/l/85/2021/03/2021_RomeoYJulieta_wnyc_V1_1400x630marquee1.jpg" srcset="https://media.wnyc.org/i/1401/934/l/85/2021/03/2021_RomeoYJulieta_wnyc_V1_1400x630marquee1.jpg 2x"/>
      <div class="featured-promo__overlay">
      </div>
      <div class="featured-promo__show">
       <a href="/podcasts/romeo-y-julieta" role="presentation" title="Romeo y Julieta">
        <img alt="" class="featured-promo__show-logo" src="https://media.wnyc.org/i/100/100/l/85/2021/03/2021_RomeoYJulieta_wnyc_V1_1400wobrand.jpg" srcset="https://media.wnyc.org/i/200/200/l/85/2021/03/2021_RomeoYJulieta_wnyc_V1_1400wobrand.jpg 2x"/>
       </a>
       <div class="featured-promo__show-details">
        <h2 class="featured-promo__show-title">
         <a href="/podcasts/romeo-y-julieta">
          Romeo y Julieta
         </a>
        </h2>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="featured-promo__details">
       <h1 class="featured-promo__item-title">
        <a href="https://www.wnycstudios.org/podcasts/romeo-y-julieta">
         Romeo y Julieta
        </a>
       </h1>
       <div class="featured-promo__item-tease">
        <p>
         A World Premiere Bilingual Audio Play. These violent delights tienen fin violento.
        </p>
       </div>
       <a class="featured-promo__morebutton" href="/podcasts/romeo-y-julieta">
        See Episodes
       </a>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>

    <div class="featured-episodes--home bucket-story-list ember-view" id="ember25028748">
     <h2>
      FEATURED EPISODES
     </h2>
     <div class="bucket-story-list__story-grid">
      <div class="bucket-story-list__item">
       <a class="bucket-story-list__image-main ember-view" href="/podcasts/romeo-y-julieta/articles/romeo-y-julieta-audio-play-audio-teatro" id="ember25028750">
        <img alt="" class="bucket-story-list__image-main" src="https://media.wnyc.org/i/652/488/l/85/2021/03/2021_RomeoYJulieta_wnyc_V1_1600x1200_pYXfh8A.jpg"/>
       </a>
       <h3 class="bucket-story-list__story-title">
        <a class="ember-view" href="/podcasts/romeo-y-julieta/articles/romeo-y-julieta-audio-play-audio-teatro" id="ember25028751">
         Romeo y Julieta: Audio Play/ Audio Teatro
        </a>
       </h3>
       <p class="bucket-story-list__story-tease">
        A full-length audio production of William Shakespeares tragedy, the production is bilingual in English and Spanish. Co-produced by The Public Theater and WNYC Studios.
       </p>
       <button aria-label="Listen to Romeo y Julieta: Audio Play/ Audio Teatro" class="bucket-story-list__listen-button episode-tease__listenbutton listen-button listen-button gtm__click-tracking yellow-square is-paused ember-view" data-action="Clicked Play/Pause On Demand: bucket-story-list" data-label="Romeo y Julieta: Audio Play/ Audio Teatro | undefined" data-test-selector="listen-button" id="ember25028752" title="Listen to Romeo y Julieta: Audio Play/ Audio Teatro">
        <div class="listen-ui ember-view" id="ember25028753">
         <!-- -->

          </polygon>
         </svg>

          <path d="M3,2 L9.03174603,2 L9.03174603,21.4508009 L3,21.4508009 L3,2 Z M14,2 L20.031746,2 L20.031746,21.4508009 L14,21.4508009 L14,2 Z" fill-rule="evenodd" id="pause" stroke="none">

       </button>
       <p class="bucket-story-list__audio-duration">

      <div class="bucket-story-list__item">
       <a class="bucket-story-list__image-main ember-view" href="/podcasts/experiment/episodes/death-penalty-spiritual-adviser" id="ember25028759">
        <img alt="" class="bucket-story-list__image-main" src="https://media.wnyc.org/i/652/488/l/85/2021/03/TheExperiment_EpisodeImage_4x3_Ep7_2AP_pPaS950.png"/>
       </a>
       <h3 class="bucket-story-list__story-title">
        <a class="ember-view" href="/podcasts/experiment/episodes/death-penalty-spiritual-adviser" id="ember25028760">
         The Volunteer
        </a>
       </h3>
       <p class="bucket-story-list__story-tease">
        Yusuf Ahmed Nur volunteered to counsel a man on death row. He never intended to witness the execution.
       </p>
       <button aria-label="Listen to The Volunteer" class="bucket-story-list__listen-button episode-tease__listenbutton listen-button listen-button gtm__click-tracking yellow-square is-paused ember-view" data-action="Clicked Play/Pause On Demand: bucket-story-list" data-label="The Volunteer | undefined" data-test-selector="listen-button" id="ember25028761" title="Listen to The Volunteer">
        <div class="listen-ui ember-view" id="ember25028762">
         <!-- -->
         <svg class="icon icon--play" height="23px" version="1.1" viewbox="2 1 20 23" width="20px" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
          <polygon fill-rule="evenodd" id="play" points="11.7777778 3.00754831 22.5631039 22.5631039 0.992451691 22.5631039" stroke="none" transform="translate(11.777778, 12.785326) rotate(90.000000) translate(-11.777778, -12.785326) ">
          </polygon>
         </svg>
         <svg class="icon icon--pause" height="20px" version="1.1" viewbox="3 2 18 20" width="18px" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
          <path d="M3,2 L9.03174603,2 L9.03174603,21.4508009 L3,21.4508009 L3,2 Z M14,2 L20.031746,2 L20.031746,21.4508009 L14,21.4508009 L14,2 Z" fill-rule="evenodd" id="pause" stroke="none">
          </path>
         </svg>
         <i class="listen-spinner">
         </i>
        </div>
        Listen
       </button>
       <p class="bucket-story-list__audio-duration">
        28 min
       </p>
       <a class="bucket-story-list__show-image ember-view" href="/podcasts/experiment" id="ember25028765" title="The Experiment">
        <img alt="" class="bucket-story-list__show-image" src="https://media.wnyc.org/i/100/100/l/85/2021/01/TheExperiment_1400_branding_Web.png"/>
       </a>
       <a class="bucket-story-list__show-title ember-view" href="/podcasts/experiment" id="ember25028766">
        <p class="bucket-story-list__show-title">
         The Experiment
        </p>
       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="bucket-story-list__item">
       <a class="bucket-story-list__image-main ember-view" href="/podcasts/la-brega/articles/vieques-and-promise-build-back-better" id="ember25028768">
        <img alt="" class="bucket-story-list__image-main" src="https://media.wnyc.org/i/652/488/l/85/2021/02/Vieques_RosauraRodriguez_1D8CDJG.png"/>
       </a>
       <h3 class="bucket-story-list__story-title">
        <a class="ember-view" href="/podcasts/la-brega/articles/vieques-and-promise-build-back-better" id="ember25028769">
         4. Vieques and the Promise To Build Back Better
        </a>
       </h3>
       <p class="bucket-story-list__story-tease">
        In this episode: the historic agreement that was supposed to help the islands reconstruction after Hurricane Maria. Supposed to.
       </p>
       <button aria-label="Listen to 4.        <h3 class="bucket-story-list__story-title">
        <a class="ember-view" href="/podcasts/radiolab/articles/dispatch-14-covid-crystal-ball" id="ember25028778">
         Dispatch 14: Covid Crystal Ball
        </a>
       </h3>
       <p class="bucket-story-list__story-tease">
        On todays episode, doctors witness the worldwide pandemic playing out in a single human body.
       </p>
